captions.text: My favorite champion is Lux.
In the name of Demacia I will punish you!
I like her the most because she can use her long range to poke/aggro opponents.
She's also a safer champion who's able to stay in the back and keep firing.
Lux is good at holding enemies in check, then advancing against them quickly.
The "poke" combination is quite popular these days.
Her ult has a short cooldown which is great for defending the base and controlling her lane.
So she's also good at siege scenario.
Because Lux is very squishy, once she's caught she's dead.
So champions like Maokai, Olaf, and Skarner,
can get her easily.
Memorable moments with Lux happen when I'm in mid lane, go off to the side
and then fire her ulitmate and accurately hit my target.
With your power level, I suggest you forfeit instead.
First of all, to play Lux well, you need to keep her cooldown at around 40 percent.
It's because you can use her skills more often than other champs.
Lux's cooldown for her skills including her ult are relatively short.
Which means using her skill that one extra time or not is super important as Lux.
Since all of Lux's abilities are skill shots
it's really difficult to utilize all her skills
and also makes it difficult to consistently hit targets.
I would say someone who can be more accurate and utilize all of Lux's skills makes a master level Lux player.
My name is Minsung "Rapidstar" Jung
My favorite champion is Lux.
Demacia!

title: Pro Player Pick: Rapidstar Picks Lux

comments.text:
she can literally be useless if she does not hit any skillshot. she is all 
about them. from her Long range ultimate to her shield and even her passive 
doesnt proc without her skillshots. she has not only low HP but she is not 
mobile aswell so she Needs A+ positioning after that she relies on 
teammates, since 3 out of 4 active abilities will not win you the game all 
on your own. there is no noobchampion out there because every single one is 
weak and strong at the same time (which is btw. what makes the game amazing 
for me) and lux needs proper positioning and a good aim (and maybe a bit o' 
luck to get dem cheesy ult blue-steals :P
comments.author: Shania Uchiha

because you position yourself poorly against lux and can't dodge skillshots
